attributes.action: Link future pay increases for MPs to those given to public sector workers
attributes.additional_details: To link future pay increases for our MPs to those given to our nurses, fire fighters, police and other public sector workers.
attributes.background: The government have given a lot of publicity and backing to the empty gesture of clapping for health and care workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. But people can't use goodwill and congratulatory gestures to pay their bills! Let's ensure that they are treated as they treat public sector in future!
